summary: Semi-autobiographical story of Conrad Rooks, who travels to France to undergo a drug-withdrawal cure. Flashbacks to the beginings of psychedelia in San Fran.
cast: Jean-Louis Barrault|Conrad Rooks|William S. Burroughs|Allen Ginsberg|Ravi Shankar|Paula Pritchett|Ornette Coleman|Swami Satchidananda|Moondog|Jill Lator|John Esam|Ed Sanders|Rita Renoir|Penny Brown|Jacques Seiler|Moustique|Sophie Stelboun|Elder Wilder|Peter Orlovsky|Pascal Aubier|France Crémieux|Rene Serisier|The Fugs|Tuli Kupferberg|Jasper Redhat|Hervé Villechaize
keywords: drugsploitation|flashback|france|manhattan new york city|times square manhattan new york city
title: Chappaqua
